name: Ferocious Leap
description: Launch yourself at an enemy, dealing 4228 Flame Damage to all enemies in the area, knocking them back, and stunning them for 2 seconds.  After leaping you gain a damage shield that absorbs 16528 damage for 6 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales with your Max Health.
effectLines: Deals Flame Damage. After leaping you gain a damage shield.
coefDescription: Launch yourself at an enemy, dealing $1 Flame Damage to all enemies in the area, knocking them back, and stunning them for 2 seconds.  After leaping you gain a damage shield that absorbs $2 damage for 6 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales with your Max Health.
rawDescription:
